DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-center, open-label, dose finding study of CV787 adenovirus in patients with hormone refractory metastatic prostate cancer. Patients will receive treatment intravenously at one of up to nine dose levels, each containing three to six patients.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of IV Injection of CV787 in Hormone Refractory Metastatic Prostate Cancer
